jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
- Build responsive websites for clients optimized for search engine exposure.

- Build content-management dashboards.

jobs.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
jobs.description:
- Added functionality to internal mobile app used by beta testers to allow for feedback survey completion and submission within the app.

- Designed push notification system for app to alert beta testers when a new feedback survey has been assigned.

jobs.title: Mechanical Engineer
jobs.description:
- Performed site visits to examine existing conditions of HVAC and plumbing systems.

- Performed heating and cooling load calculations using Trane Trace.

- Selected equipment based on calculation results.

- Designed and modeled HVAC and plumbing systems using AutoCAD and Revit.

- Examined shop drawings to ensure contracted equipment met the specifications of designs.

jobs.title: Assistant Engineer 1
jobs.description:
- Modeled HVAC and plumbing systems using AutoCAD and Revit.

- Performed heating load calculations using Trane Trace
